verses.roman:
keha gāya, keha nāce, mahotsava haila
dadhi, dugdha, ghṛta āila grāme yata chila

synonyms: keha gāya—some sing; keha nāce—some dance; mahotsava haila—there was a festival; dadhi—yogurt; dugdha—milk; ghṛta—clarified butter; āila—was brought; grāme—in the village; yata—as much; chila—as there was.
translation: During the festival at the installation ceremony, some people sang and some danced. All the milk, yogurt and clarified butter in the village was brought to the festival.
